title: We need a button to mute all
body: sometimes we want to mute all the ppl in the game for some reason, if u can add a mute all button on the top of the team when we press "TAB" that will be much easier, click on button rather than click on 4 buttons or 8, 12 to mute everything

replies.body: press 10 times on keyboard and 2 times left click, wich one is easier?
I believe you can type /muteall that used to work, no idea if it does now
